text: Yanca mobadala, tyancya palanakartyajavala nirantara rahanarya jannati aheta, jyancya khali (thanda panyace) pravaha vahata asatila, jyata te sadaivakala rahatila. Sarvasrestha allaha tyancyasi raji jhala, ani he tyacyasi raji jhale. He (kevala asa manasakarita ahe jo apalya palanakartyace bhaya rakhato)
